name: AJ+
description:
AJ+ is a global news community for the connected generation. We highlight human struggles and achievements, empower impassioned voices and challenge the status quo. We bring you the stories that are shaping our world. Do you ever laugh, cry, get angry or inspired? You’ll fit right in.

Download the AJ+ app and join the conversation.
about: We're part of a global generation - without borders - connected to issues that impact your life, our world.

Resaltamos luchas y logros humanos, apoyamos las voces apasionadas que desafían el status quo, compartiendo las historias que le dan forma a nuestro mundo. 

¡Únete a la conversación!
about: Somos parte de la generación global –sin fronteras– que conecta a los jóvenes latinoamericanos entre sí y a los temas que impactan su vida y nuestro mundo.

name: Radio Ecuamerica
description:
Uno de los aspectos más importantes que cumple nuestra Empresa Radial "RADIO ECUAMERICA FM " es, llegar en forma óptima con nuestras ondas al mayor número de radio escuchas con la mejor cobertura física y con una calidad de sonido insuperable, a nuestros radio escuchas de todo el planeta, utilizando la tecnología de punta que al momento dispone nuestra Empresa Radial, con la única finalidad, de mantener y acrecentar el sentimiento de hermandad en el habitante universal y fortalecer el sentimiento patriótico  de nuestros coterráneos a través del mensaje musical, cultural y social que cuotidianamente lo practicamos.


RADIO ECUAMERICA FM, a pesar de los limitados recursos económicos y la abundante competencia radial, se proyecta convertirse en el medio de comunicación referente dentro de la comunidad latina en el mundo, dentro de lo que tiene que ver con el avance tecnológico, la captación de radio escuchas de habla hispana, así como el sustento en la variedad de la programación, como vínculo de aprendizaje y entretenimiento de todos nuestros hermanos, especialmente de los que hemos decidido migrar para explorar nuevas experiencias o buscar un porvenir para los nuestros.

Esperamos ser la mejor companía, para que puedan así superar su soledad y alejamiento familiar acortando distancias a través de la música y nuestra variada programación, creada por todos y cada unos de uds.

DERECHOS RESERVADOS POR: 
 NEW YORK   NETWORK
                        2014
about:
Página Oficial 
Original & Auténtica
Radio Ecuamerica ✔

name: RYOT
description:
In today’s fast-paced world, news is everywhere — on computers, tablets, and phones in addition to traditional media outlets like newspaper, television and radio. We are often moved by what we read and hear, but we’ve struggled to find ways to participate, to actually reach out and change the news. 

That’s where RYOT comes in. 

Instead of leaving you feeling helpless and frustrated, RYOT will give you the power to “Become the News.“
about: The first news site that lets you take action on every story and become the news.

name: Tastemade
description:
We created Tastemade with one goal in mind, to connect the world through video. Some of the most unifying and special moments of our life center around a meal, the place where people come together.  We know that we cannot do this alone, nor would we want to.  It will take a community of deeply passionate people.  Luckily tastemakers, like you, from around the world are already creating amazing content, communities and engaging with your passion.  Share it with others and touch one more person each day.

Don't forget to follow us on Twitter, Youtube, Pinterest, and Instagram!

name: The Weather Channel
description:
Welcome to the official Facebook page of The Weather Channel! The main goal of this page is for all of you to engage, discuss and connect with not only The Weather Channel, but the rest of the community as well.

The following guidelines are designed to help provide a quality environment for our fans. Please take a minute to read them and keep them in mind whenever you participate. 

While we are excited to hear from everyone, it is important to note that postings by fans to The Weather Channel’s Facebook page do not necessarily reflect the opinions of The Weather Channel, nor does The Weather Channel confirm their accuracy. 

We understand that weather is a subject many of you are passionate about – a passion we share. We welcome all questions and commentary, including constructive feedback. But we do expect that participants post content and commentary that is both relevant and respectful to this community as a whole. The Weather Channel reserves the right to remove any posts that don’t adhere to our guidelines and to block anyone who violates them repeatedly. Specifically, we will not tolerate these kinds of posts: 

• Abusive, harassing, stalking, threatening or attacking others
• Defamatory, offensive, obscene, vulgar or depicting violence 
• Hateful in language targeting race/ethnicity, religion, gender, nationality or political beliefs 
• Fraudulent, deceptive, misleading or unlawful
• Trolling or deliberate disruption of discussion
• Violations of any intellectual property rights 
• Spamming in nature
• Uploading files that contain viruses or programs that could damage the operation of other people’s computers
• Commercial solicitation or solicitation of donations
• Link baiting (embedding a link in your post to draw traffic to your own site)
about: The day's top weather stories and expert insights from the most trusted source in weather.

name: Upworthy
description:
The internet was supposed to open doors to new ideas. But too often it’s the opposite and narrows our world instead of broadening it. And fills it with empty stories that drown out the ones that matter most.

But sometimes a story opens a door to a new and better world. It might make you feel surprised, happy, inspired, motivated — even sad. Stories like that give us what we're missing in life. They connect us with each other. They change our hearts and our minds. They are worth our time.

Upworthy tells those stories, and helps them reach millions every day. Stories that are worth your time — and that make the world a better place.
about: Upworthy is on a mission to tell stories that bring people together — because we’re all part of the same story. Found something #upworthy?

name: Vox
description:
Vox.com is a pioneer in explanatory journalism. We help you understand the news and the world around you.

That is to say, our end goal isn’t telling you what just happened, or how we feel about what just happened, it’s making sure you understand what just happened. We deliver a lot of contextual information that traditional news stories aren't designed to carry.

Vox.com is part of the Vox Media family and joined by The Verge, SB Nation, Polygon, Eater, Racked, Curbed, and Re/code.

Check us out:

Our team of producers, researchers, programmers and engineers are always working hard to bring our listeners the latest and finest in quality programming.

Our social community department has just been expanded, making it easier and more fun to interact with Radio One on our website, here on Facebook, Instagram & on Twitter.

Feel free to get connected and tell us anything about the radio station. What are you favourite hits? What prizes do you want to win? What topics do you want us to discuss on-air?

name: Power of Positivity
description:
Power of Positivity celebrates the lifestyle of positive thinking and attitude. 

We encourage you daily to embrace the power of positive thinking and truly live each day being the change you wish to see in the world. 

We are here to inspire you, keep you motivated and expand your awareness and ability to access the power of positivity. 

From personal experience, we believe that we can co-create our life every day. It starts with our thoughts and our emotions, which leads to our actions. When we transform our thoughts about ourselves, our world and our future, we can achieve our grandest visions and dreams. 

We create original images and content on an array of topics like: Positivity, Inspiration, Relationships, Quotes, Health, Wellness, Law of Attraction, Good News, Spirituality, Yoga, Mindfulness, Gratitude, Happiness, Peace,  Love, Healthy Living and more. 

It is such a special time right now. We are entering into a new paradigm of creation and expansion. We are grateful to be on this journey with you. 

Remember: Everyday is a day to shine. Shine On! 

Love & Light, 
Kristen & Chris
about:
The Official Power of Positivity® 

A News / Media Website with a mission to provide daily inspiration, motivation and tools to live a happier life.

name: JukinVideo
description:
POSTING POLICIES:

JukinVideo Facebook page strives to be a fun online experience for all. Part of that mission is building an inclusive community where everyone can share their ideas, tips and tricks, stories, and photos. In order for that community to flourish we ask that you abide by the following guidelines. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to ask!

1. Play nice: If you’re like us, you love viral videos and pics. However, we all have strong opinions and a desire to share them. We want to hear your opinions. But please be respectful of other people’s opinions, even if they differ from yours.

2. Watch the language: There are times and places for four-letter words. Our online community isn’t one of them. If your mom would wash your mouth out for saying it as a kid, then it’s not appropriate here.

3. No name calling: It should be possible to share your views, understand someone else's views, and disagree with someone else's views, without the need for personal insults. 

4. No trolling: Discussions, even heated ones, are healthy and encouraged. However, spouting offensive ideas just to get a rise out of people is not. 

5. No copyrighted material: Unless you own the copyright, or have express written permission from the owner, please don’t post copyrighted material. We will take it down.

6. No spam: Nobody likes getting random flyers on their car windshield and we’re no different. If you’d like to be featured as a partner, shoot us an email first. 

7. Do share: Please feel free to post pictures or videos of you or your friends or family making funny fails or wins.  Share them with the community! But they must be clean (safe for work), people must be fully clothed and you must be able to prove the video is yours!

8. Only post your Facebook screen name. Do not post your email address, your BBM pin, your Skype, your IM, your mobile or anything other than your Facebook screen name. And do not post anyone else’s Facebook screen name.

9. Violations: Everyone makes mistakes – even us. A single violation of community posting policies won’t necessarily get you banned, but repeated infractions certainly will.

10. Feedback: We’re here for you. If there’s something you’d like to see changed or think can be improved upon please let us know. 
Note that JukinVideo will delete submissions that contain vulgar language, personal attacks of any kind, offensive comments, and comments that are rude and inappropriate. Further, JukinVideo reserves the right to delete comments for any other reason.

Feel free to send us a Facebook message with any feedback, questions, or concerns and we'll respond with the quickness. 

JukinVideo is a Jukin Media Inc Property.

For information regarding media licensing or copyright protection, please contact: 

licensing@jukinmedia.com

For information regarding business, press materials, advertising rates, or sponsorships, please contact: 

media@jukinmedia.com

Jukin Media Inc is a full-service digital media company specializing in licensing, production and video monetization.
about: Submit your videos to be featured on the channel: http://jukinvideo.com/Submissions
